name: VideoGameNewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Video Game News Brief brings you headlines and news fresh from the news wire. From game consoles to personal computers and everything in between, this news brief will fill you in on the latest gaming information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
